meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jolly.
meanings.sent1: Her jolliness brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: His jolliness was so infectious that everyone couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The jolliness in the air was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The jolliness of the party made it a night to remember.

meanings.definition: A feeling or expression of cheerfulness and good humor.
meanings.sent1: The jolliness in her laughter was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: His face lit up with jolliness when he saw his surprise.
meanings.sent3: The jolliness in the joke had everyone laughing out loud.
meanings.sent4: The jolliness of the moment felt like a burst of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes sparkled with jolliness as she shared the good news.
